other_tests.findings: Initial SPECT images revealed decreased perfusion in the left frontal temporal lobe region.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Repeat SPECT brain images showed a normal pattern of activity after treatment.

other_tests.findings: Left-sided carotid artery stenosis with a 27% decrease in flow rate.
Results showed cirrhosis with chronic hepatitis consistent with chronic hepatitis C virus infection.
